verses.text: \w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w advantage|strong="G4053"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* hath the \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w*? \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w profit|strong="G5622"\w* \add is there\add* of \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w*?

\w Much|strong="G4183"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w way|strong="G5158"\w*: \w chiefly|strong="G4412"\w*, because \w that|strong="G3754"\w* unto them were \w committed|strong="G4100"\w* the \w oracles|strong="G3051"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* did not \w believe|strong="G0569"\w*? \w shall|strong="G3361"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w unbelief|strong="G0570"\w* \w make|strong="G2673"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* without \w effect|strong="G2673"\w*?

God \w forbid|strong="G1096"\w*: \w yea|strong="G1161"\w*, \w let|strong="G1096"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w true|strong="G0227"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* a \w liar|strong="G5583"\w*; \w as|strong="G2531"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, \w That|strong="G3704"\w* thou mightest be \w justified|strong="G1344"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w sayings|strong="G3056"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* mightest \w overcome|strong="G3528"\w* \w when|strong="G1722"\w* \w thou|strong="G4571"\w* art \w judged|strong="G2919"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w unrighteousness|strong="G0093"\w* \w commend|strong="G4921"\w* the \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w what|strong="G5101"\w* shall we \w say|strong="G2046"\w*? \add Is\add* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w unrighteous|strong="G0094"\w* who \w taketh|strong="G2018"\w* \w vengeance|strong="G3709"\w*? (I \w speak|strong="G3004"\w* \w as|strong="G2596"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w*)
God \w forbid|strong="G1096"\w*: for \w then|strong="G1893"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* \w shall|strong="G2919"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*?

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath more \w abounded|strong="G4052"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* \w my|strong="G1699"\w* \w lie|strong="G5582"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*; \w why|strong="G5101"\w* \w yet|strong="G2089"\w* am I \w also|strong="G2504"\w* \w judged|strong="G2919"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w sinner|strong="G0268"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \add rather\add*, (\w as|strong="G2531"\w* we be slanderously \w reported|strong="G0987"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* affirm \w that|strong="G5346"\w* \w we|strong="G2248"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*,) Let us \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* may \w come|strong="G2064"\w*? \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w damnation|strong="G2917"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w just|strong="G1738"\w*.

\w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w*? are we \w better|strong="G4284"\w* \add than they\add*? \w No|strong="G3756"\w*, in no \w wise|strong="G3843"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* we have before \w proved|strong="G4256"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="G1672"\w*, that they \w are|strong="G1511"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*;

\w As|strong="G2531"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, There \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w none|strong="G3756"\w* \w righteous|strong="G1342"\w*, no, \w not|strong="G3761"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w*:

There \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w none|strong="G3756"\w* that \w understandeth|strong="G4920"\w*, there \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w none|strong="G3756"\w* that seeketh \w after|strong="G1567"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

They are \w all|strong="G3956"\w* gone out of the \w way|strong="G1578"\w*, they \w are|strong="G0889"\w* \w together|strong="G0260"\w* become \w unprofitable|strong="G0889"\w*; there \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w none|strong="G3756"\w* that \w doeth|strong="G4160"\w* \w good|strong="G5544"\w*, no, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w*.

\w Their|strong="G0846"\w* \w throat|strong="G2995"\w* \add is\add* an \w open|strong="G0455"\w* \w sepulchre|strong="G5028"\w*; \w with|strong="G1100"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w* they have used \w deceit|strong="G1387"\w*; the \w poison|strong="G2447"\w* of \w asps|strong="G0785"\w* \add is\add* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w lips|strong="G5491"\w*:
\w Whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* \add is\add* \w full|strong="G1073"\w* of \w cursing|strong="G0685"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w bitterness|strong="G4088"\w*:
\w Their|strong="G0846"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w* \add are\add* \w swift|strong="G3691"\w* to \w shed|strong="G1632"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*:
\w Destruction|strong="G4938"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w misery|strong="G5004"\w* \add are\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w ways|strong="G3598"\w*:
\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w way|strong="G3598"\w* of \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* have \w they|strong="G1097"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w known|strong="G1097"\w*:
There \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w before|strong="G0561"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* we \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* what things \w soever|strong="G3745"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, it \w saith|strong="G2980"\w* to them who \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w under|strong="G1722"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*: \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* may be \w stopped|strong="G5420"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w* may \w become|strong="G1096"\w* \w guilty|strong="G5267"\w* before \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G1360"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* the \w deeds|strong="G2041"\w* of the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* there \w shall|strong="G1344"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* be \w justified|strong="G1344"\w* \w in|strong="G1799"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w sight|strong="G1799"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \add is\add* the \w knowledge|strong="G1922"\w* of \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G3570"\w* the \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* is \w manifested|strong="G5319"\w*, being \w witnessed|strong="G3140"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*;

\w Even|strong="G1161"\w* the \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \add which is\add* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* them that \w believe|strong="G4100"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* there \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w difference|strong="G1293"\w*:

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* have \w sinned|strong="G0264"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* come \w short|strong="G5302"\w* of the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*;

Being \w justified|strong="G1344"\w* \w freely|strong="G1432"\w* \w by|strong="G5485"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* the \w redemption|strong="G0629"\w* that \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*:

\w Whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath set \w forth|strong="G4388"\w* \add to be\add* a \w propitiation|strong="G2435"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w declare|strong="G1732"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* the \w remission|strong="G3929"\w* of \w sins|strong="G0265"\w* that are \w past|strong="G4266"\w*, through the forbearance of God;

\w To|strong="G4314"\w* \w declare|strong="G1732"\w*, \add I say\add*, \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3568"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*: \w that|strong="G1519"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* might \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w just|strong="G1342"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w justifier|strong="G1344"\w* of him which \w believeth|strong="G4102"\w* in \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w Where|strong="G4226"\w* \add is\add* \w boasting|strong="G2746"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w*? It is \w excluded|strong="G1576"\w*. \w By|strong="G1223"\w* \w what|strong="G4169"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*? of \w works|strong="G2041"\w*? \w Nay|strong="G3780"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* of \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* we conclude \w that|strong="G3049"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w* is \w justified|strong="G1344"\w* by \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* the \w deeds|strong="G2041"\w* of the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*.

\add Is he\add* the \w God|strong="G2316"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w*? \add is he\add* \w not|strong="G3780"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*? \w Yes|strong="G3483"\w*, of the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*:

\w Seeing|strong="G1897"\w* \add it is\add* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* shall \w justify|strong="G1344"\w* the \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w uncircumcision|strong="G0203"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

Do \w we|strong="G2673"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* make \w void|strong="G2673"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*? God \w forbid|strong="G1096"\w*: \w yea|strong="G0235"\w*, we \w establish|strong="G2476"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*.
